Arabic: ثُمَّ مَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّيْنِۗ
Transliteration: ṡumma mā adrāka mā yaumud-dīn
Transcript: ṡum ma mā ad rā ka mā yau mud dīn

Arabic: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْـًٔا ۗوَالْاَمْرُ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ لِّلّٰهِ ࣖ
Transliteration: yauma lā tamliku nafsul linafsin syai`ā, wal-amru yauma`iżil lillāh
Transcript: yau ma lā tam li ku naf sul li naf sin syai `ā , wal am ru yau ma `i żil lil lāh

Arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِيْنَۙ
Transliteration: wailul lil-muṭaffifīn
Transcript: wai lul lil mu ṭaf fi fīn

Arabic: الَّذِيْنَ اِذَا اكْتَالُوْا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُوْنَۖ
Transliteration: allażīna iżaktālụ 'alan-nāsi yastaufụn
Transcript: al la żī na i żak tā lụ 'a lan nā si yas tau fụn

Arabic: وَاِذَا كَالُوْهُمْ اَوْ وَّزَنُوْهُمْ يُخْسِرُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: wa iżā kālụhum aw wazanụhum yukhsirụn
Transcript: wa i żā kā lụ hum aw wa za nụ hum yukh si rụn

Arabic: اَلَا يَظُنُّ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَنَّهُمْ مَّبْعُوْثُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: alā yaẓunnu ulā`ika annahum mab'ụṡụn
Transcript: a lā ya ẓun nu u lā `i ka an na hum mab 'ụ ṡụn

Arabic: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيْمٍۙ
Transliteration: liyaumin 'aẓīm
Transcript: li yau min 'a ẓīm

Arabic: يَّوْمَ يَقُوْمُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعٰلَمِيْنَۗ
Transliteration: yauma yaqụmun-nāsu lirabbil-'ālamīn
Transcript: yau ma ya qụ mun nā su li rab bil 'ā la mīn

Arabic: كَلَّآ اِنَّ كِتٰبَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِيْ سِجِّيْنٍۗ
Transliteration: kallā inna kitābal-fujjāri lafī sijjīn
Transcript: kal lā in na ki tā bal fuj jā ri la fī sij jīn

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا سِجِّيْنٌۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā sijjīn
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mā sij jīn

Arabic: كِتٰبٌ مَّرْقُوْمٌۗ
Transliteration: kitābum marqụm
Transcript: ki tā bum mar qụm

Arabic: وَيْلٌ يَّوْمَىِٕذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِيْنَۙ
Transliteration: wailuy yauma`iżil lil-mukażżibīn
Transcript: wai luy yau ma `i żil lil mu każ żi bīn

Arabic: الَّذِيْنَ يُكَذِّبُوْنَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّيْنِۗ
Transliteration: allażīna yukażżibụna biyaumid-dīn
Transcript: al la żī na yu każ żi bụ na bi yau mid dīn

Arabic: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهٖٓ اِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ اَثِيْمٍۙ
Transliteration: wa mā yukażżibu bihī illā kullu mu'tadin aṡīm
Transcript: wa mā yu każ żi bu bi hī il lā kul lu mu' ta din a ṡīm

Arabic: اِذَا تُتْلٰى عَلَيْهِ اٰيٰتُنَا قَالَ اَسَاطِيْرُ الْاَوَّلِيْنَۗ
Transliteration: iżā tutlā 'alaihi āyātunā qāla asāṭīrul-awwalīn
Transcript: i żā tut lā 'a lai hi ā yā tu nā qā la a sā ṭī rul aw wa līn

Arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ ۜرَانَ عَلٰى قُلُوْبِهِمْ مَّا كَانُوْا يَكْسِبُوْنَ
Transliteration: kallā bal rāna 'alā qulụbihim mā kānụ yaksibụn
Transcript: kal lā bal rā na 'a lā qu lụ bi him mā kā nụ yak si bụn

Arabic: كَلَّآ اِنَّهُمْ عَنْ رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ لَّمَحْجُوْبُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: kallā innahum 'ar rabbihim yauma`iżil lamaḥjụbụn
Transcript: kal lā in na hum 'ar rab bi him yau ma `i żil la maḥ jụ bụn

Arabic: ثُمَّ اِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُوا الْجَحِيْمِۗ
Transliteration: ṡumma innahum laṣālul-jaḥīm
Transcript: ṡum ma in na hum la ṣā lul ja ḥīm

Arabic: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هٰذَا الَّذِيْ كُنْتُمْ بِهٖ تُكَذِّبُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: ṡumma yuqālu hāżallażī kuntum bihī tukażżibụn
Transcript: ṡum ma yu qā lu hā żal la żī kun tum bi hī tu każ żi bụn

Arabic: كَلَّآ اِنَّ كِتٰبَ الْاَبْرَارِ لَفِيْ عِلِّيِّيْنَۗ
Transliteration: kallā inna kitābal-abrāri lafī 'illiyyīn
Transcript: kal lā in na ki tā bal ab rā ri la fī 'il liy yīn

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا عِلِّيُّوْنَۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā 'illiyyụn
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mā 'il liy yụn

Arabic: كِتٰبٌ مَّرْقُوْمٌۙ
Transliteration: kitābum marqụm
Transcript: ki tā bum mar qụm

Arabic: يَّشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: yasy-haduhul-muqarrabụn
Transcript: yasy ha du hul mu qar ra bụn

Arabic: اِنَّ الْاَبْرَارَ لَفِيْ نَعِيْمٍۙ
Transliteration: innal-abrāra lafī na'īm
Transcript: in nal ab rā ra la fī na 'īm

Arabic: عَلَى الْاَرَاۤىِٕكِ يَنْظُرُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: 'alal-arā`iki yanẓurụn
Transcript: a lal a rā `i ki yan ẓu rụn

Arabic: تَعْرِفُ فِيْ وُجُوْهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيْمِۚ
Transliteration: ta'rifu fī wujụhihim naḍratan na'īm
Transcript: ta' ri fu fī wu jụ hi him naḍ ra tan na 'īm

Arabic: يُسْقَوْنَ مِنْ رَّحِيْقٍ مَّخْتُوْمٍۙ
Transliteration: yusqauna mir raḥīqim makhtụm
Transcript: yus qau na mir ra ḥī qim makh tụm

Arabic: خِتٰمُهٗ مِسْكٌ ۗوَفِيْ ذٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: khitāmuhụ misk, wa fī żālika falyatanāfasil-mutanāfisụn
Transcript: khi tā mu hụ misk , wa fī żā li ka fal ya ta nā fa sil mu ta nā fi sụn

Arabic: وَمِزَاجُهٗ مِنْ تَسْنِيْمٍۙ
Transliteration: wa mizājuhụ min tasnīm
Transcript: wa mi zā ju hụ min tas nīm

Arabic: عَيْنًا يَّشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: 'ainay yasyrabu bihal-muqarrabụn
Transcript: ai nay yasy ra bu bi hal mu qar ra bụn

Arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اَجْرَمُوْا كَانُوْا مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا يَضْحَكُوْنَۖ
Transliteration: innallażīna ajramụ kānụ minallażīna āmanụ yaḍ-ḥakụn
Transcript: in nal la żī na aj ra mụ kā nụ mi nal la żī na ā ma nụ yaḍ ḥa kụn

Arabic: وَاِذَا مَرُّوْا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُوْنَۖ
Transliteration: wa iżā marrụ bihim yatagāmazụn
Transcript: wa i żā mar rụ bi him ya ta gā ma zụn

Arabic: وَاِذَا انْقَلَبُوْٓا اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهِمُ انْقَلَبُوْا فَكِهِيْنَۖ
Transliteration: wa iżangqalabū ilā ahlihimungqalabụ fakihīn
Transcript: wa i żang qa la bū i lā ah li hi mung qa la bụ fa ki hīn

Arabic: وَاِذَا رَاَوْهُمْ قَالُوْٓا اِنَّ هٰٓؤُلَاۤءِ لَضَاۤلُّوْنَۙ
Transliteration: wa iżā ra`auhum qālū inna hā`ulā`i laḍāllụn
Transcript: wa i żā ra `au hum qā lū in na hā `u lā `i la ḍāl lụn

Arabic: وَمَآ اُرْسِلُوْا عَلَيْهِمْ حٰفِظِيْنَۗ
Transliteration: wa mā ursilụ 'alaihim ḥāfiẓīn
Transcript: wa mā ur si lụ 'a lai him ḥā fi ẓīn

Arabic: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: fal-yaumallażīna āmanụ minal-kuffāri yaḍ-ḥakụn
Transcript: fal yau mal la żī na ā ma nụ mi nal kuf fā ri yaḍ ḥa kụn

Arabic: عَلَى الْاَرَاۤىِٕكِ يَنْظُرُوْنَۗ
Transliteration: 'alal-arā`iki yanẓurụn
Transcript: a lal a rā `i ki yan ẓu rụn

Arabic: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوْا يَفْعَلُوْنَ ࣖ
Transliteration: hal ṡuwwibal-kuffāru mā kānụ yaf'alụn
Transcript: hal ṡuw wi bal kuf fā ru mā kā nụ yaf 'a lụn

Arabic: اِذَا السَّمَاۤءُ انْشَقَّتْۙ
Transliteration: iżas-samā`unsyaqqat
Transcript: i żas sa mā `un syaq qat

Arabic: وَاَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْۙ
Transliteration: wa ażinat lirabbihā wa ḥuqqat
Transcript: wa a żi nat li rab bi hā wa ḥuq qat

Arabic: وَاِذَا الْاَرْضُ مُدَّتْۙ
Transliteration: wa iżal-arḍu muddat
Transcript: wa i żal ar ḍu mud dat

Arabic: وَاَلْقَتْ مَا فِيْهَا وَتَخَلَّتْۙ
Transliteration: wa alqat mā fīhā wa takhallat
Transcript: wa al qat mā fī hā wa ta khal lat

Arabic: وَاَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْۗ
Transliteration: wa ażinat lirabbihā wa ḥuqqat
Transcript: wa a żi nat li rab bi hā wa ḥuq qat

Arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الْاِنْسَانُ اِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ اِلٰى رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلٰقِيْهِۚ
Transliteration: yā ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kad-ḥan fa mulāqīh
Transcript: yā ay yu hal in sā nu in na ka kā di ḥun i lā rab bi ka kad ḥan fa mu lā qīh

Arabic: فَاَمَّا مَنْ اُوْتِيَ كِتٰبَهٗ بِيَمِيْنِهٖۙ
Transliteration: fa ammā man ụtiya kitābahụ biyamīnih
Transcript: fa am mā man ụ ti ya ki tā ba hụ bi ya mī nih

Arabic: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَّسِيْرًاۙ
Transliteration: fa saufa yuḥāsabu ḥisābay yasīrā
Transcript: fa sau fa yu ḥā sa bu ḥi sā bay ya sī rā

Arabic: وَّيَنْقَلِبُ اِلٰٓى اَهْلِهٖ مَسْرُوْرًاۗ
Transliteration: wa yangqalibu ilā ahlihī masrụrā
Transcript: wa yang qa li bu i lā ah li hī mas rụ rā

Arabic: وَاَمَّا مَنْ اُوْتِيَ كِتٰبَهٗ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهْرِهٖۙ
Transliteration: wa ammā man ụtiya kitābahụ warā`a ẓahrih
Transcript: wa am mā man ụ ti ya ki tā ba hụ wa rā `a ẓah rih

Arabic: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُوْ ثُبُوْرًاۙ
Transliteration: fa saufa yad'ụ ṡubụrā
Transcript: fa sau fa yad 'ụ ṡu bụ rā

Arabic: وَّيَصْلٰى سَعِيْرًاۗ
Transliteration: wa yaṣlā sa'īrā
Transcript: wa yaṣ lā sa 'ī rā

Arabic: اِنَّهٗ كَانَ فِيْٓ اَهْلِهٖ مَسْرُوْرًاۗ
Transliteration: innahụ kāna fī ahlihī masrụrā
Transcript: in na hụ kā na fī ah li hī mas rụ rā

Arabic: اِنَّهٗ ظَنَّ اَنْ لَّنْ يَّحُوْرَ ۛ
Transliteration: innahụ ẓanna al lay yaḥụr
Transcript: in na hụ ẓan na al lay ya ḥụr

Arabic: بَلٰىۛ اِنَّ رَبَّهٗ كَانَ بِهٖ بَصِيْرًاۗ
Transliteration: balā inna rabbahụ kāna bihī baṣīrā
Transcript: ba lā in na rab ba hụ kā na bi hī ba ṣī rā

Arabic: فَلَآ اُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِۙ
Transliteration: fa lā uqsimu bisy-syafaq
Transcript: fa lā uq si mu bisy sya faq

Arabic: وَالَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَۙ
Transliteration: wal-laili wa mā wasaq
Transcript: wal lai li wa mā wa saq

Arabic: وَالْقَمَرِ اِذَا اتَّسَقَۙ
Transliteration: wal-qamari iżattasaq
Transcript: wal qa ma ri i żat ta saq

Arabic: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَنْ طَبَقٍۗ
Transliteration: latarkabunna ṭabaqan 'an ṭabaq
Transcript: la tar ka bun na ṭa ba qan 'an ṭa baq

Arabic: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: fa mā lahum lā yu`minụn
Transcript: fa mā la hum lā yu` mi nụn

Arabic: وَاِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْاٰنُ لَا يَسْجُدُوْنَ ۗ ۩
Transliteration: wa iżā quri`a 'alaihimul-qur`ānu lā yasjudụn
Transcript: wa i żā qu ri `a 'a lai hi mul qur `ā nu lā yas ju dụn

Arabic: بَلِ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا يُكَذِّبُوْنَۖ
Transliteration: balillażīna kafarụ yukażżibụn
Transcript: ba lil la żī na ka fa rụ yu każ żi bụn

Arabic: وَاللّٰهُ اَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوْعُوْنَۖ
Transliteration: wallāhu a'lamu bimā yụ'ụn
Transcript: l llā hu a' la mu bi mā yụ 'ụn

Arabic: فَبَشِّرْهُمْ بِعَذَابٍ اَلِيْمٍۙ
Transliteration: fa basysyir-hum bi'ażābin alīm
Transcript: fa basy syir hum bi 'a żā bin a līm

Arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ لَهُمْ اَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: illallażīna āmanụ wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun gairu mamnụn
Transcript: il lal la żī na ā ma nụ wa 'a mi luṣ ṣā li ḥā ti la hum aj run gai ru mam nụn

Arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوْجِۙ
Transliteration: was-samā`i żātil-burụj
Transcript: was sa mā `i żā til bu rụj

Arabic: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُوْدِۙ
Transliteration: wal-yaumil-mau'ụd
Transcript: wal yau mil mau 'ụd

Arabic: وَشَاهِدٍ وَّمَشْهُوْدٍۗ
Transliteration: wa syāhidiw wa masy-hụd
Transcript: wa syā hi diw wa masy hụd

Arabic: قُتِلَ اَصْحٰبُ الْاُخْدُوْدِۙ
Transliteration: qutila aṣ-ḥābul-ukhdụd
Transcript: qu ti la aṣ ḥā bul ukh dụd

Arabic: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُوْدِۙ
Transliteration: an-nāri żātil-waqụd
Transcript: an nā ri żā til wa qụd

Arabic: اِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُوْدٌۙ
Transliteration: iż hum 'alaihā qu'ụd
Transcript: iż hum 'a lai hā qu 'ụd

Arabic: وَّهُمْ عَلٰى مَا يَفْعَلُوْنَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ شُهُوْدٌ ۗ
Transliteration: wa hum 'alā mā yaf'alụna bil-mu`minīna syuhụd
Transcript: wa hum 'a lā mā yaf 'a lụ na bil mu` mi nī na syu hụd

Arabic: وَمَا نَقَمُوْا مِنْهُمْ اِلَّآ اَنْ يُّؤْمِنُوْا بِاللّٰهِ الْعَزِيْزِ الْحَمِيْدِۙ
Transliteration: wa mā naqamụ min-hum illā ay yu`minụ billāhil-'azīzil-ḥamīd
Transcript: wa mā na qa mụ min hum il lā ay yu` mi nụ bil lā hil 'a zī zil ḥa mīd

Arabic: الَّذِيْ لَهٗ مُلْكُ السَّمٰوٰتِ وَالْاَرْضِ ۗوَاللّٰهُ عَلٰى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيْدٌ ۗ
Transliteration: allażī lahụ mulkus-samāwāti wal-arḍ, wallāhu 'alā kulli syai`in syahīd
Transcript: al la żī la hụ mul kus sa mā wā ti wal arḍ , wall llā hu 'a lā kul li syai `in sya h

Arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِيْنَ وَالْمُؤْمِنٰتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ
Transliteration: nallażīna fatanul-mu`minīna wal-mu`mināti ṡumma la
Transcript: n nal la żī na fa ta nul mu` mi nī na wal mu` mi nā ti ṡum ma la

Arabic: يَتُوْبُوْا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيْقِۗ
Transliteration: yatụbụ fa lahum 'ażābu jahannama wa lahum 'ażābul-ḥarī
Transcript: m ya tụ bụ fa la hum 'a żā bu ja han na ma wa la hum 'a żā bul ḥa rī

Arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ لَهُمْ جَنّٰتٌ تَجْرِيْ
Transliteration: nallażīna āmanụ wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātun tajrī
Transcript: n nal la żī na ā ma nụ wa 'a mi luṣ ṣā li ḥā ti la hum jan nā tun taj rī

Arabic: مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْاَنْهٰرُ ەۗ ذٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيْرُۗ
Transliteration: min taḥtihal-an-hār, żālikal-fauzul-kab
Transcript: ī min taḥ ti hal an hār , żā li kal fau zul ka b

Arabic: اِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيْدٌ ۗ
Transliteration: inna baṭsya rabbika lasyadīd
Transcript: in na baṭ sya rab bi ka la sya dīd

Arabic: اِنَّهٗ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيْدُۚ
Transliteration: innahụ huwa yubdi`u wa yu'īd
Transcript: in na hụ hu wa yub di `u wa yu 'īd

Arabic: وَهُوَ الْغَفُوْرُ الْوَدُوْدُۙ
Transliteration: wa huwal-gafụrul-wadụd
Transcript: wa hu wal ga fụ rul wa dụd

Arabic: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيْدُۙ
Transliteration: żul-'arsyil-majīd
Transcript: żul 'ar syil ma jīd

Arabic: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيْدُۗ
Transliteration: fa''ālul limā yurīd
Transcript: fa' 'ā lul li mā yu rīd

Arabic: هَلْ اَتٰىكَ حَدِيْثُ الْجُنُوْدِۙ
Transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīṡul-junụd
Transcript: hal a tā ka ḥa dī ṡul ju nụd

Arabic: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُوْدَۗ
Transliteration: fir'auna wa ṡamụd
Transcript: fir 'au na wa ṡa mụd

Arabic: بَلِ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا فِيْ تَكْذِيْبٍۙ
Transliteration: balillażīna kafarụ fī takżīb
Transcript: ba lil la żī na ka fa rụ fī tak żīb

Arabic: وَّاللّٰهُ مِنْ وَّرَاۤىِٕهِمْ مُّحِيْطٌۚ
Transliteration: wallāhu miw warā`ihim muḥīṭ
Transcript: l llā hu miw wa rā `i him mu ḥīṭ

Arabic: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْاٰنٌ مَّجِيْدٌۙ
Transliteration: bal huwa qur`ānum majīd
Transcript: bal hu wa qur `ā num ma jīd

Arabic: فِيْ لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوْظٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: fī lauḥim maḥfụẓ
Transcript: fī lau ḥim maḥ fụẓ

Arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءِ وَالطَّارِقِۙ
Transliteration: was-samā`i waṭ-ṭāriq
Transcript: was sa mā `i waṭ ṭā riq

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا الطَّارِقُۙ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka maṭ-ṭāriq
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka maṭ ṭā riq

Arabic: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُۙ
Transliteration: an-najmuṡ-ṡāqib
Transcript: an naj muṡ ṡā qib

Arabic: اِنْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌۗ
Transliteration: ing kullu nafsil lammā 'alaihā ḥāfiẓ
Transcript: ing kul lu naf sil lam mā 'a lai hā ḥā fiẓ

Arabic: فَلْيَنْظُرِ الْاِنْسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
Transliteration: falyanẓuril-insānu mimma khuliq
Transcript: fal yan ẓu ril in sā nu mim ma khu liq

Arabic: خُلِقَ مِنْ مَّاۤءٍ دَافِقٍۙ
Transliteration: khuliqa mim mā`in dāfiq
Transcript: khu li qa mim mā `in dā fiq

Arabic: يَّخْرُجُ مِنْۢ بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَاۤىِٕبِۗ
Transliteration: yakhruju mim bainiṣ-ṣulbi wat-tarā`ib
Transcript: yakh ru ju mim bai niṣ ṣul bi wat ta rā `ib

Arabic: اِنَّهٗ عَلٰى رَجْعِهٖ لَقَادِرٌۗ
Transliteration: innahụ 'alā raj'ihī laqādir
Transcript: in na hụ 'a lā raj 'i hī la qā dir

Arabic: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَاۤىِٕرُۙ
Transliteration: yauma tublas-sarā`ir
Transcript: yau ma tub las sa rā `ir

Arabic: فَمَا لَهٗ مِنْ قُوَّةٍ وَّلَا نَاصِرٍۗ
Transliteration: fa mā lahụ ming quwwatiw wa lā nāṣir
Transcript: fa mā la hụ ming quw wa tiw wa lā nā ṣir

Arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِۙ
Transliteration: was-samā`i żātir-raj'
Transcript: was sa mā `i żā tir raj'

Arabic: وَالْاَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِۙ
Transliteration: wal-arḍi żātiṣ-ṣad'
Transcript: wal ar ḍi żā tiṣ ṣad'

Arabic: اِنَّهٗ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌۙ
Transliteration: innahụ laqaulun faṣl
Transcript: in na hụ la qau lun faṣl

Arabic: وَّمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِۗ
Transliteration: wa mā huwa bil-hazl
Transcript: wa mā hu wa bil hazl

Arabic: اِنَّهُمْ يَكِيْدُوْنَ كَيْدًاۙ
Transliteration: innahum yakīdụna kaidā
Transcript: in na hum ya kī dụ na kai dā

Arabic: وَّاَكِيْدُ كَيْدًاۖ
Transliteration: wa akīdu kaidā
Transcript: wa a kī du kai dā

Arabic: فَمَهِّلِ الْكٰفِرِيْنَ اَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا ࣖ
Transliteration: fa mahhilil-kāfirīna am-hil-hum ruwaidā
Transcript: fa mah hi lil kā fi rī na am hil hum ru wai dā

Arabic: سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْاَعْلَىۙ
Transliteration: sabbiḥisma rabbikal-a'lā
Transcript: sab bi ḥis ma rab bi kal a' lā

Arabic: الَّذِيْ خَلَقَ فَسَوّٰىۖ
Transliteration: allażī khalaqa fa sawwā
Transcript: al la żī kha la qa fa saw wā

Arabic: وَالَّذِيْ قَدَّرَ فَهَدٰىۖ
Transliteration: wallażī qaddara fa hadā
Transcript: wal la żī qad da ra fa ha dā

Arabic: وَالَّذِيْٓ اَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعٰىۖ
Transliteration: wallażī akhrajal-mar'ā
Transcript: wal la żī akh ra jal mar 'ā

Arabic: فَجَعَلَهٗ غُثَاۤءً اَحْوٰىۖ
Transliteration: fa ja'alahụ guṡā`an aḥwā
Transcript: fa ja 'a la hụ gu ṡā `an aḥ wā

Arabic: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنْسٰىٓ ۖ
Transliteration: sanuqri`uka fa lā tansā
Transcript: sa nuq ri `u ka fa lā tan sā

Arabic: اِلَّا مَا شَاۤءَ اللّٰهُ ۗاِنَّهٗ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفٰىۗ
Transliteration: illā mā syā`allāh, innahụ ya'lamul-jahra wa mā yakhfā
Transcript: l llāh , in na hụ ya' la mul jah ra wa mā yakh fā

Arabic: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرٰىۖ
Transliteration: wa nuyassiruka lil-yusrā
Transcript: wa nu yas si ru ka lil yus rā

Arabic: فَذَكِّرْ اِنْ نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرٰىۗ
Transliteration: fa żakkir in nafa'atiż-żikrā
Transcript: fa żak kir in na fa 'a tiż żik rā

Arabic: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَنْ يَّخْشٰىۙ
Transliteration: sayażżakkaru may yakhsyā
Transcript: sa yaż żak ka ru may yakh syā

Arabic: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْاَشْقَىۙ
Transliteration: wa yatajannabuhal-asyqā
Transcript: wa ya ta jan na bu hal asy qā

Arabic: الَّذِيْ يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرٰىۚ
Transliteration: allażī yaṣlan-nāral-kubrā
Transcript: al la żī yaṣ lan nā ral kub rā

Arabic: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوْتُ فِيْهَا وَلَا يَحْيٰىۗ
Transliteration: ṡumma lā yamụtu fīhā wa lā yaḥyā
Transcript: ṡum ma lā ya mụ tu fī hā wa lā yaḥ yā

Arabic: قَدْ اَفْلَحَ مَنْ تَزَكّٰىۙ
Transliteration: qad aflaḥa man tazakkā
Transcript: qad af la ḥa man ta zak kā

Arabic: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهٖ فَصَلّٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa żakarasma rabbihī fa ṣallā
Transcript: wa ża ka ras ma rab bi hī fa ṣal lā

Arabic: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُوْنَ الْحَيٰوةَ الدُّنْيَاۖ
Transliteration: bal tu`ṡirụnal-ḥayātad-dun-yā
Transcript: bal tu` ṡi rụ nal ḥa yā tad dun yā

Arabic: وَالْاٰخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَّاَبْقٰىۗ
Transliteration: wal-ākhiratu khairuw wa abqā
Transcript: wal ā khi ra tu khai ruw wa ab qā

Arabic: اِنَّ هٰذَا لَفِى الصُّحُفِ الْاُوْلٰىۙ
Transliteration: inna hāżā lafiṣ-ṣuḥufil-ụlā
Transcript: in na hā żā la fiṣ ṣu ḥu fil ụ lā

Arabic: صُحُفِ اِبْرٰهِيْمَ وَمُوْسٰى ࣖ
Transliteration: ṣuḥufi ibrāhīma wa mụsā
Transcript: ṣu ḥu fi ib rā hī ma wa mụ sā

Arabic: هَلْ اَتٰىكَ حَدِيْثُ الْغَاشِيَةِۗ
Transliteration: hal atāka ḥadīṡul-gāsyiyah
Transcript: hal a tā ka ḥa dī ṡul gā syi yah

Arabic: وُجُوْهٌ يَّوْمَىِٕذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: wujụhuy yauma`iżin khāsyi'ah
Transcript: wu jụ huy yau ma `i żin khā syi 'ah

Arabic: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: 'āmilatun nāṣibah
Transcript: ā mi la tun nā ṣi bah

Arabic: تَصْلٰى نَارًا حَامِيَةً ۙ
Transliteration: taṣlā nāran ḥāmiyah
Transcript: taṣ lā nā ran ḥā mi yah

Arabic: تُسْقٰى مِنْ عَيْنٍ اٰنِيَةٍ ۗ
Transliteration: tusqā min 'ainin āniyah
Transcript: tus qā min 'ai nin ā ni yah

Arabic: لَيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ اِلَّا مِنْ ضَرِيْعٍۙ
Transliteration: laisa lahum ṭa'āmun illā min ḍarī'
Transcript: lai sa la hum ṭa 'ā mun il lā min ḍa rī'

Arabic: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِيْ مِنْ جُوْعٍۗ
Transliteration: lā yusminu wa lā yugnī min jụ'
Transcript: lā yus mi nu wa lā yug nī min jụ'

Arabic: وُجُوْهٌ يَّوْمَىِٕذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: wujụhuy yauma`iżin nā'imah
Transcript: wu jụ huy yau ma `i żin nā 'i mah

Arabic: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: lisa'yihā rāḍiyah
Transcript: li sa' yi hā rā ḍi yah

Arabic: فِيْ جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍۙ
Transliteration: fī jannatin 'āliyah
Transcript: fī jan na tin 'ā li yah

Arabic: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيْهَا لَاغِيَةً ۗ
Transliteration: lā tasma'u fīhā lāgiyah
Transcript: lā tas ma 'u fī hā lā gi yah

Arabic: فِيْهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ ۘ
Transliteration: fīhā 'ainun jāriyah
Transcript: fī hā 'ai nun jā ri yah

Arabic: فِيْهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوْعَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: fīhā sururum marfụ'ah
Transcript: fī hā su ru rum mar fụ 'ah

Arabic: وَّاَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوْعَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: wa akwābum mauḍụ'ah
Transcript: wa ak wā bum mau ḍụ 'ah

Arabic: وَّنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوْفَةٌ ۙ
Transliteration: wa namāriqu maṣfụfah
Transcript: wa na mā ri qu maṣ fụ fah

Arabic: وَّزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوْثَةٌ ۗ
Transliteration: wa zarābiyyu mabṡụṡah
Transcript: wa za rā biy yu mab ṡụ ṡah

Arabic: اَفَلَا يَنْظُرُوْنَ اِلَى الْاِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْۗ
Transliteration: a fa lā yanẓurụna ilal-ibili kaifa khuliqat
Transcript: a fa lā yan ẓu rụ na i lal i bi li kai fa khu li qat

Arabic: وَاِلَى السَّمَاۤءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْۗ
Transliteration: wa ilas-samā`i kaifa rufi'at
Transcript: wa i las sa mā `i kai fa ru fi 'at

Arabic: وَاِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْۗ
Transliteration: wa ilal-jibāli kaifa nuṣibat
Transcript: wa i lal ji bā li kai fa nu ṣi bat

Arabic: وَاِلَى الْاَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْۗ
Transliteration: wa ilal-arḍi kaifa suṭiḥat
Transcript: wa i lal ar ḍi kai fa su ṭi ḥat

Arabic: فَذَكِّرْۗ اِنَّمَآ اَنْتَ مُذَكِّرٌۙ
Transliteration: fa żakkir, innamā anta mużakkir
Transcript: fa żak kir , in na mā an ta mu żak kir

Arabic: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِمُصَيْطِرٍۙ
Transliteration: lasta 'alaihim bimuṣaiṭir
Transcript: las ta 'a lai him bi mu ṣai ṭir

Arabic: اِلَّا مَنْ تَوَلّٰى وَكَفَرَۙ
Transliteration: illā man tawallā wa kafar
Transcript: il lā man ta wal lā wa ka far

Arabic: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللّٰهُ الْعَذَابَ الْاَكْبَرَۗ
Transliteration: fa yu'ażżibuhullāhul-'ażābal-akbar
Transcript: l llā hul 'a żā bal ak bar

Arabic: اِنَّ اِلَيْنَآ اِيَابَهُمْ
Transliteration: inna ilainā iyābahum
Transcript: in na i lai nā i yā ba hum

Arabic: ثُمَّ اِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُمْ ࣖ
Transliteration: ṡumma inna 'alainā ḥisābahum
Transcript: ṡum ma in na 'a lai nā ḥi sā ba hum

Arabic: وَالْفَجْرِۙ
Transliteration: wal-fajr
Transcript: wal fajr

Arabic: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍۙ
Transliteration: wa layālin 'asyr
Transcript: wa la yā lin 'asyr

Arabic: وَّالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِۙ
Transliteration: wasy-syaf'i wal-watr
Transcript: wasy syaf 'i wal watr

Arabic: وَالَّيْلِ اِذَا يَسْرِۚ
Transliteration: wal-laili iżā yasr
Transcript: wal lai li i żā yasr

Arabic: هَلْ فِيْ ذٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِيْ حِجْرٍۗ
Transliteration: hal fī żālika qasamul liżī ḥijr
Transcript: hal fī żā li ka qa sa mul li żī ḥijr

Arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍۖ
Transliteration: a lam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi'ād
Transcript: a lam ta ra kai fa fa 'a la rab bu ka bi 'ād

Arabic: اِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِۖ
Transliteration: irama żātil-'imād
Transcript: i ra ma żā til 'i mād

Arabic: الَّتِيْ لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِى الْبِلَادِۖ
Transliteration: allatī lam yukhlaq miṡluhā fil-bilād
Transcript: al la tī lam yukh laq miṡ lu hā fil bi lād

Arabic: وَثَمُوْدَ الَّذِيْنَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِۖ
Transliteration: wa ṡamụdallażīna jābuṣ-ṣakhra bil-wād
Transcript: wa ṡa mụ dal la żī na jā buṣ ṣakh ra bil wād

Arabic: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِى الْاَوْتَادِۖ
Transliteration: wa fir'auna żil-autād
Transcript: wa fir 'au na żil au tād

Arabic: الَّذِيْنَ طَغَوْا فِى الْبِلَادِۖ
Transliteration: allażīna ṭagau fil-bilād
Transcript: al la żī na ṭa gau fil bi lād

Arabic: فَاَكْثَرُوْا فِيْهَا الْفَسَادَۖ
Transliteration: fa akṡarụ fīhal-fasād
Transcript: fa ak ṡa rụ fī hal fa sād

Arabic: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍۖ
Transliteration: fa ṣabba 'alaihim rabbuka sauṭa 'ażāb
Transcript: fa ṣab ba 'a lai him rab bu ka sau ṭa 'a żāb

Arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِۗ
Transliteration: inna rabbaka labil-mirṣād
Transcript: in na rab ba ka la bil mir ṣād

Arabic: فَاَمَّا الْاِنْسَانُ اِذَا مَا ابْتَلٰىهُ رَبُّهٗ فَاَكْرَمَهٗ وَنَعَّمَهٗۙ فَيَقُوْلُ رَبِّيْٓ اَكْرَمَنِۗ
Transliteration: fa ammal-insānu iżā mabtalāhu rabbuhụ fa akramahụ wa na''amahụ fa yaqụlu rabbī akraman
Transcript: fa am mal in sā nu i żā mab ta lā hu rab bu hụ fa ak ra ma hụ wa na' 'a ma hụ fa ya qụ lu rab bī ak ra man

Arabic: وَاَمَّآ اِذَا مَا ابْتَلٰىهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهٗ ەۙ فَيَقُوْلُ رَبِّيْٓ اَهَانَنِۚ
Transliteration: wa ammā iżā mabtalāhu fa qadara 'alaihi rizqahụ fa yaqụlu rabbī ahānan
Transcript: wa am mā i żā mab ta lā hu fa qa da ra 'a lai hi riz qa hụ fa ya qụ lu rab bī a hā nan

Arabic: كَلَّا بَلْ لَّا تُكْرِمُوْنَ الْيَتِيْمَۙ
Transliteration: kallā bal lā tukrimụnal-yatīm
Transcript: kal lā bal lā tuk ri mụ nal ya tīm

Arabic: وَلَا تَحٰۤضُّوْنَ عَلٰى طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِيْنِۙ
Transliteration: wa lā tahāḍḍụna 'alā ṭa'āmil-miskīn
Transcript: wa lā ta hāḍ ḍụ na 'a lā ṭa 'ā mil mis kīn

Arabic: وَتَأْكُلُوْنَ التُّرَاثَ اَكْلًا لَّمًّاۙ
Transliteration: wa ta`kulụnat-turāṡa aklal lammā
Transcript: wa ta` ku lụ nat tu rā ṡa ak lal lam mā

Arabic: وَّتُحِبُّوْنَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّاۗ
Transliteration: wa tuḥibbụnal-māla ḥubban jammā
Transcript: wa tu ḥib bụ nal mā la ḥub ban jam mā

Arabic: كَلَّآ اِذَا دُكَّتِ الْاَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّاۙ
Transliteration: kallā iżā dukkatil-arḍu dakkan dakkā
Transcript: kal lā i żā duk ka til ar ḍu dak kan dak kā

Arabic: وَّجَآءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّاۚ
Transliteration: wa jā`a rabbuka wal-malaku ṣaffan ṣaffā
Transcript: wa jā `a rab bu ka wal ma la ku ṣaf fan ṣaf fā

Arabic: وَجِايْۤءَ يَوْمَىِٕذٍۢ بِجَهَنَّمَۙ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ يَّتَذَكَّرُ الْاِنْسَانُ وَاَنّٰى لَهُ الذِّكْرٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa jī`a yauma`iżim bijahannama yauma`iżiy yatażakkarul-insānu wa annā lahuż-żikrā
Transcript: wa jī `a yau ma `i żim bi ja han na ma yau ma `i żiy ya ta żak ka rul in sā nu wa an nā la huż żik rā

Arabic: يَقُوْلُ يٰلَيْتَنِيْ قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِيْۚ
Transliteration: yaqụlu yā laitanī qaddamtu liḥayātī
Transcript: ya qụ lu yā lai ta nī qad dam tu li ḥa yā tī

Arabic: فَيَوْمَىِٕذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهٗٓ اَحَدٌ ۙ
Transliteration: fa yauma`iżil lā yu'ażżibu 'ażābahū aḥad
Transcript: fa yau ma `i żil lā yu 'aż żi bu 'a żā ba hū a ḥad

Arabic: وَّلَا يُوْثِقُ وَثَاقَهٗٓ اَحَدٌ ۗ
Transliteration: wa lā yụṡiqu waṡāqahū aḥad
Transcript: wa lā yụ ṡi qu wa ṡā qa hū a ḥad

Arabic: يٰٓاَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَىِٕنَّةُۙ
Transliteration: yā ayyatuhan-nafsul-muṭma`innah
Transcript: yā ay ya tu han naf sul muṭ ma `in nah

Arabic: ارْجِعِيْٓ اِلٰى رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً ۚ
Transliteration: irji'ī ilā rabbiki rāḍiyatam marḍiyyah
Transcript: ir ji 'ī i lā rab bi ki rā ḍi ya tam mar ḍiy yah

Arabic: فَادْخُلِيْ فِيْ عِبٰدِيْۙ
Transliteration: fadkhulī fī 'ibādī
Transcript: fad khu lī fī 'i bā dī

Arabic: وَادْخُلِيْ جَنَّتِيْ ࣖࣖ
Transliteration: wadkhulī jannatī
Transcript: wad khu lī jan na tī

Arabic: لَآ اُقْسِمُ بِهٰذَا الْبَلَدِۙ
Transliteration: lā uqsimu bihāżal-balad
Transcript: lā uq si mu bi hā żal ba lad

Arabic: وَاَنْتَ حِلٌّۢ بِهٰذَا الْبَلَدِۙ
Transliteration: wa anta ḥillum bihāżal-balad
Transcript: wa an ta ḥil lum bi hā żal ba lad

Arabic: وَوَالِدٍ وَّمَا وَلَدَۙ
Transliteration: wa wālidiw wa mā walad
Transcript: wa wā li diw wa mā wa lad

Arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْاِنْسَانَ فِيْ كَبَدٍۗ
Transliteration: laqad khalaqnal-insāna fī kabad
Transcript: la qad kha laq nal in sā na fī ka bad

Arabic: اَيَحْسَبُ اَنْ لَّنْ يَّقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ اَحَدٌ ۘ
Transliteration: a yaḥsabu al lay yaqdira 'alaihi aḥad
Transcript: a yaḥ sa bu al lay yaq di ra 'a lai hi a ḥad

Arabic: يَقُوْلُ اَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًاۗ
Transliteration: yaqụlu ahlaktu mālal lubadā
Transcript: ya qụ lu ah lak tu mā lal lu ba dā

Arabic: اَيَحْسَبُ اَنْ لَّمْ يَرَهٗٓ اَحَدٌۗ
Transliteration: a yaḥsabu al lam yarahū aḥad
Transcript: a yaḥ sa bu al lam ya ra hū a ḥad

Arabic: اَلَمْ نَجْعَلْ لَّهٗ عَيْنَيْنِۙ
Transliteration: a lam naj'al lahụ 'ainaīn
Transcript: a lam naj 'al la hụ 'ai naīn

Arabic: وَلِسَانًا وَّشَفَتَيْنِۙ
Transliteration: wa lisānaw wa syafataīn
Transcript: wa li sā naw wa sya fa taīn

Arabic: وَهَدَيْنٰهُ النَّجْدَيْنِۙ
Transliteration: wa hadaināhun-najdaīn
Transcript: wa ha dai nā hun naj daīn

Arabic: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ ۖ
Transliteration: fa laqtaḥamal-'aqabah
Transcript: fa laq ta ḥa mal 'a qa bah

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ ۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mal-'aqabah
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mal 'a qa bah

Arabic: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍۙ
Transliteration: fakku raqabah
Transcript: fak ku ra qa bah

Arabic: اَوْ اِطْعَامٌ فِيْ يَوْمٍ ذِيْ مَسْغَبَةٍۙ
Transliteration: au iṭ'āmun fī yaumin żī masgabah
Transcript: au iṭ 'ā mun fī yau min żī mas ga bah

Arabic: يَّتِيْمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍۙ
Transliteration: yatīman żā maqrabah
Transcript: ya tī man żā maq ra bah

Arabic: اَوْ مِسْكِيْنًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍۗ
Transliteration: au miskīnan żā matrabah
Transcript: au mis kī nan żā mat ra bah

Arabic: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِۗ
Transliteration: ṡumma kāna minallażīna āmanụ wa tawāṣau biṣ-ṣabri wa tawāṣau bil-mar-ḥamah
Transcript: ṡum ma kā na mi nal la żī na ā ma nụ wa ta wā ṣau biṣ ṣab ri wa ta wā ṣau bil mar ḥa mah

Arabic: اُولٰۤىِٕكَ اَصْحٰبُ الْمَيْمَنَةِۗ
Transliteration: ulā`ika aṣ-ḥābul-maimanah
Transcript: u lā `i ka aṣ ḥā bul mai ma nah

Arabic: وَالَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا بِاٰيٰتِنَا هُمْ اَصْحٰبُ الْمَشْئَمَةِۗ
Transliteration: wallażīna kafarụ bi`āyātinā hum aṣ-ḥābul-masy`amah
Transcript: wal la żī na ka fa rụ bi `ā yā ti nā hum aṣ ḥā bul masy `a mah

Arabic: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ ࣖ
Transliteration: 'alaihim nārum mu`ṣadah
Transcript: a lai him nā rum mu` ṣa dah

Arabic: وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wasy-syamsi wa ḍuḥāhā
Transcript: wasy syam si wa ḍu ḥā hā

Arabic: وَالْقَمَرِ اِذَا تَلٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wal-qamari iżā talāhā
Transcript: wal qa ma ri i żā ta lā hā

Arabic: وَالنَّهَارِ اِذَا جَلّٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wan-nahāri iżā jallāhā
Transcript: wan na hā ri i żā jall llā

Arabic: وَالَّيْلِ اِذَا يَغْشٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wal-laili iżā yagsyāhā
Transcript: wal lai li i żā yag syā hā

Arabic: وَالسَّمَاۤءِ وَمَا بَنٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: was-samā`i wa mā banāhā
Transcript: was sa mā `i wa mā ba nā hā

Arabic: وَالْاَرْضِ وَمَا طَحٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wal-arḍi wa mā ṭaḥāhā
Transcript: wal ar ḍi wa mā ṭa ḥā hā

Arabic: وَنَفْسٍ وَّمَا سَوّٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: wa nafsiw wa mā sawwāhā
Transcript: wa naf siw wa mā saw wā hā

Arabic: فَاَلْهَمَهَا فُجُوْرَهَا وَتَقْوٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: fa al-hamahā fujụrahā wa taqwāhā
Transcript: fa al ha ma hā fu jụ ra hā wa taq wā hā

Arabic: قَدْ اَفْلَحَ مَنْ زَكّٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: qad aflaḥa man zakkāhā
Transcript: qad af la ḥa man zak kā hā

Arabic: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَنْ دَسّٰىهَاۗ
Transliteration: wa qad khāba man dassāhā
Transcript: wa qad khā ba man das sā hā

Arabic: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُوْدُ بِطَغْوٰىهَآ ۖ
Transliteration: każżabaṡ ṡamụdu biṭagwāhā
Transcript: każ ża baṡ ṡa mụ du bi ṭag wā hā

Arabic: اِذِ انْۢبَعَثَ اَشْقٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: iżimba'aṡa asyqāhā
Transcript: i żim ba 'a ṡa asy qā hā

Arabic: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُوْلُ اللّٰهِ نَاقَةَ اللّٰهِ وَسُقْيٰهَاۗ
Transliteration: fa qāla lahum rasụlullāhi nāqatallāhi wa suqyāhā
Transcript: fa qā la la hum ra sụ lull llā hi nā qa tall llā hi wa suq

Arabic: فَكَذَّبُوْهُ فَعَقَرُوْهَاۖ فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُمْ بِذَنْۢبِهِمْ فَسَوّٰىهَاۖ
Transliteration: fa każżabụhu fa 'aqarụhā fa damdama 'alaihim rabbuhum biżambihim fa sawwāhā
Transcript: fa każ ża bụ hu fa 'a qa rụ hā fa dam da ma 'a lai him rab bu hum bi żam bi him fa saw wā hā

Arabic: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبٰهَا ࣖ
Transliteration: wa lā yakhāfu 'uqbāhā
Transcript: wa lā ya khā fu 'uq bā hā

Arabic: وَالَّيْلِ اِذَا يَغْشٰىۙ
Transliteration: wal-laili iżā yagsyā
Transcript: wal lai li i żā yag syā

Arabic: وَالنَّهَارِ اِذَا تَجَلّٰىۙ
Transliteration: wan-nahāri iżā tajallā
Transcript: wan na hā ri i żā ta jal lā

Arabic: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْاُنْثٰىٓ ۙ
Transliteration: wa mā khalaqaż-żakara wal-unṡā
Transcript: wa mā kha la qaż ża ka ra wal un ṡā

Arabic: اِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتّٰىۗ
Transliteration: inna sa'yakum lasyattā
Transcript: in na sa' ya kum la syat tā

Arabic: فَاَمَّا مَنْ اَعْطٰى وَاتَّقٰىۙ
Transliteration: fa ammā man a'ṭā wattaqā
Transcript: fa am mā man a' ṭā wat ta qā

Arabic: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنٰىۙ
Transliteration: wa ṣaddaqa bil-ḥusnā
Transcript: wa ṣad da qa bil ḥus nā

Arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهٗ لِلْيُسْرٰىۗ
Transliteration: fa sanuyassiruhụ lil-yusrā
Transcript: fa sa nu yas si ru hụ lil yus rā

Arabic: وَاَمَّا مَنْۢ بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنٰىۙ
Transliteration: wa ammā mam bakhila wastagnā
Transcript: wa am mā mam ba khi la was tag nā

Arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنٰىۙ
Transliteration: wa każżaba bil-ḥusnā
Transcript: wa każ ża ba bil ḥus nā

Arabic: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهٗ لِلْعُسْرٰىۗ
Transliteration: fa sanuyassiruhụ lil-'usrā
Transcript: fa sa nu yas si ru hụ lil 'us rā

Arabic: وَمَا يُغْنِيْ عَنْهُ مَالُهٗٓ اِذَا تَرَدّٰىٓۙ
Transliteration: wa mā yugnī 'an-hu māluhū iżā taraddā
Transcript: wa mā yug nī 'an hu mā lu hū i żā ta rad dā

Arabic: اِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدٰىۖ
Transliteration: inna 'alainā lal-hudā
Transcript: in na 'a lai nā lal hu dā

Arabic: وَاِنَّ لَنَا لَلْاٰخِرَةَ وَالْاُوْلٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa inna lanā lal-ākhirata wal-ụlā
Transcript: wa in na la nā lal ā khi ra ta wal ụ lā

Arabic: فَاَنْذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظّٰىۚ
Transliteration: fa anżartukum nāran talaẓẓā
Transcript: fa an żar tu kum nā ran ta laẓ ẓā

Arabic: لَا يَصْلٰىهَآ اِلَّا الْاَشْقَىۙ
Transliteration: lā yaṣlāhā illal-asyqā
Transcript: lā yaṣ lā hā il lal asy qā

Arabic: الَّذِيْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّٰىۗ
Transliteration: allażī każżaba wa tawallā
Transcript: al la żī każ ża ba wa ta wal lā

Arabic: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْاَتْقَىۙ
Transliteration: wa sayujannabuhal-atqā
Transcript: wa sa yu jan na bu hal at qā

Arabic: الَّذِيْ يُؤْتِيْ مَالَهٗ يَتَزَكّٰىۚ
Transliteration: allażī yu`tī mālahụ yatazakkā
Transcript: al la żī yu` tī mā la hụ ya ta zak kā

Arabic: وَمَا لِاَحَدٍ عِنْدَهٗ مِنْ نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزٰىٓۙ
Transliteration: wa mā li`aḥadin 'indahụ min ni'matin tujzā
Transcript: wa mā li `a ḥa din 'in da hụ min ni' ma tin tuj zā

Arabic: اِلَّا ابْتِغَاۤءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْاَعْلٰىۚ
Transliteration: illabtigā`a waj-hi rabbihil-a'lā
Transcript: il lab ti gā `a waj hi rab bi hil a' lā

Arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضٰى ࣖ
Transliteration: wa lasaufa yarḍā
Transcript: wa la sau fa yar ḍā

Arabic: وَالضُّحٰىۙ
Transliteration: waḍ-ḍuḥā
Transcript: waḍ ḍu ḥā

Arabic: وَالَّيْلِ اِذَا سَجٰىۙ
Transliteration: wal-laili iżā sajā
Transcript: wal lai li i żā sa jā

Arabic: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلٰىۗ
Transliteration: mā wadda'aka rabbuka wa mā qalā
Transcript: mā wad da 'a ka rab bu ka wa mā qa lā

Arabic: وَلَلْاٰخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْاُوْلٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa lal-ākhiratu khairul laka minal-ụlā
Transcript: wa lal ā khi ra tu khai rul la ka mi nal ụ lā

Arabic: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيْكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa lasaufa yu'ṭīka rabbuka fa tarḍā
Transcript: wa la sau fa yu' ṭī ka rab bu ka fa tar ḍā

Arabic: اَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيْمًا فَاٰوٰىۖ
Transliteration: a lam yajidka yatīman fa āwā
Transcript: a lam ya jid ka ya tī man fa ā wā

Arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَاۤلًّا فَهَدٰىۖ
Transliteration: wa wajadaka ḍāllan fa hadā
Transcript: wa wa ja da ka ḍāl lan fa ha dā

Arabic: وَوَجَدَكَ عَاۤىِٕلًا فَاَغْنٰىۗ
Transliteration: wa wajadaka 'ā`ilan fa agnā
Transcript: wa wa ja da ka 'ā `i lan fa ag nā

Arabic: فَاَمَّا الْيَتِيْمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْۗ
Transliteration: fa ammal-yatīma fa lā taq-har
Transcript: fa am mal ya tī ma fa lā taq har

Arabic: وَاَمَّا السَّاۤىِٕلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
Transliteration: wa ammas-sā`ila fa lā tan-har
Transcript: wa am mas sā `i la fa lā tan har

Arabic: وَاَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa ammā bini'mati rabbika fa ḥaddiṡ
Transcript: wa am mā bi ni' ma ti rab bi ka fa ḥad diṡ

Arabic: اَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَۙ
Transliteration: a lam nasyraḥ laka ṣadrak
Transcript: a lam nasy raḥ la ka ṣad rak

Arabic: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنْكَ وِزْرَكَۙ
Transliteration: wa waḍa'nā 'angka wizrak
Transcript: wa wa ḍa' nā 'ang ka wiz rak

Arabic: الَّذِيْٓ اَنْقَضَ ظَهْرَكَۙ
Transliteration: allażī angqaḍa ẓahrak
Transcript: al la żī ang qa ḍa ẓah rak

Arabic: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَۗ
Transliteration: wa rafa'nā laka żikrak
Transcript: wa ra fa' nā la ka żik rak

Arabic: فَاِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًاۙ
Transliteration: fa inna ma'al-'usri yusrā
Transcript: fa in na ma 'al 'us ri yus rā

Arabic: اِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًاۗ
Transliteration: inna ma'al-'usri yusrā
Transcript: in na ma 'al 'us ri yus rā

Arabic: فَاِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانْصَبْۙ
Transliteration: fa iżā faragta fanṣab
Transcript: fa i żā fa rag ta fan ṣab

Arabic: وَاِلٰى رَبِّكَ فَارْغَبْ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa ilā rabbika fargab
Transcript: wa i lā rab bi ka far gab

Arabic: وَالتِّيْنِ وَالزَّيْتُوْنِۙ
Transliteration: wat-tīni waz-zaitụn
Transcript: wat tī ni waz zai tụn

Arabic: وَطُوْرِ سِيْنِيْنَۙ
Transliteration: wa ṭụri sīnīn
Transcript: wa ṭụ ri sī nīn

Arabic: وَهٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْاَمِيْنِۙ
Transliteration: wa hāżal-baladil-amīn
Transcript: wa hā żal ba la dil a mīn

Arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْاِنْسَانَ فِيْٓ اَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيْمٍۖ
Transliteration: laqad khalaqnal-insāna fī aḥsani taqwīm
Transcript: la qad kha laq nal in sā na fī aḥ sa ni taq wīm

Arabic: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنٰهُ اَسْفَلَ سَافِلِيْنَۙ
Transliteration: ṡumma radadnāhu asfala sāfilīn
Transcript: ṡum ma ra dad nā hu as fa la sā fi līn

Arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ فَلَهُمْ اَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍۗ
Transliteration: illallażīna āmanụ wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti fa lahum ajrun gairu mamnụn
Transcript: il lal la żī na ā ma nụ wa 'a mi luṣ ṣā li ḥā ti fa la hum aj run gai ru mam nụn

Arabic: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّيْنِۗ
Transliteration: fa mā yukażżibuka ba'du bid-dīn
Transcript: fa mā yu każ żi bu ka ba' du bid dīn

Arabic: اَلَيْسَ اللّٰهُ بِاَحْكَمِ الْحٰكِمِيْنَ ࣖ
Transliteration: a laisallāhu bi`aḥkamil-ḥākimīn
Transcript: l llā hu bi `aḥ ka mil ḥā ki mīn

Arabic: اِقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِيْ خَلَقَۚ
Transliteration: iqra` bismi rabbikallażī khalaq
Transcript: iq ra` bis mi rab bi kal la żī kha laq

Arabic: خَلَقَ الْاِنْسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍۚ
Transliteration: khalaqal-insāna min 'alaq
Transcript: kha la qal in sā na min 'a laq

Arabic: اِقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْاَكْرَمُۙ
Transliteration: iqra` wa rabbukal-akram
Transcript: iq ra` wa rab bu kal ak ram

Arabic: الَّذِيْ عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِۙ
Transliteration: allażī 'allama bil-qalam
Transcript: al la żī 'al la ma bil qa lam

Arabic: عَلَّمَ الْاِنْسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْۗ
Transliteration: 'allamal-insāna mā lam ya'lam
Transcript: al la mal in sā na mā lam ya' lam

Arabic: كَلَّآ اِنَّ الْاِنْسَانَ لَيَطْغٰىٓ ۙ
Transliteration: kallā innal-insāna layaṭgā
Transcript: kal lā in nal in sā na la yaṭ gā

Arabic: اَنْ رَّاٰهُ اسْتَغْنٰىۗ
Transliteration: ar ra`āhustagnā
Transcript: ar ra `ā hus tag nā

Arabic: اِنَّ اِلٰى رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعٰىۗ
Transliteration: inna ilā rabbikar-ruj'ā
Transcript: in na i lā rab bi kar ruj 'ā

Arabic: اَرَاَيْتَ الَّذِيْ يَنْهٰىۙ
Transliteration: a ra`aitallażī yan-hā
Transcript: a ra `ai tal la żī yan hā

Arabic: عَبْدًا اِذَا صَلّٰىۗ
Transliteration: 'abdan iżā ṣallā
Transcript: ab dan i żā ṣal lā

Arabic: اَرَاَيْتَ اِنْ كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدٰىٓۙ
Transliteration: a ra`aita ing kāna 'alal-hudā
Transcript: a ra `ai ta ing kā na 'a lal hu dā

Arabic: اَوْ اَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوٰىۗ
Transliteration: au amara bit-taqwā
Transcript: au a ma ra bit taq wā

Arabic: اَرَاَيْتَ اِنْ كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلّٰىۗ
Transliteration: a ra`aita ing każżaba wa tawallā
Transcript: a ra `ai ta ing każ ża ba wa ta wal lā

Arabic: اَلَمْ يَعْلَمْ بِاَنَّ اللّٰهَ يَرٰىۗ
Transliteration: a lam ya'lam bi`annallāha yarā
Transcript: a lam ya' lam bi `an nall llā ha ya

Arabic: كَلَّا لَىِٕنْ لَّمْ يَنْتَهِ ەۙ لَنَسْفَعًاۢ بِالنَّاصِيَةِۙ
Transliteration: kallā la`il lam yantahi lanasfa'am bin-nāṣiyah
Transcript: kal lā la `il lam yan ta hi la nas fa 'am bin nā ṣi yah

Arabic: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍۚ
Transliteration: nāṣiyating kāżibatin khāṭi`ah
Transcript: nā ṣi ya ting kā żi ba tin khā ṭi `ah

Arabic: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهٗۙ
Transliteration: falyad'u nādiyah
Transcript: fal yad 'u nā di yah

Arabic: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَۙ
Transliteration: sanad'uz-zabāniyah
Transcript: sa nad 'uz za bā ni yah

Arabic: كَلَّاۗ لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِبْ ۩ ࣖ
Transliteration: kallā, lā tuṭi'hu wasjud waqtarib
Transcript: kal lā , lā tu ṭi' hu was jud waq ta rib

Arabic: اِنَّآ اَنْزَلْنٰهُ فِيْ لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
Transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī lailatil-qadr
Transcript: in nā an zal nā hu fī lai la til qadr

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā lailatul-qadr
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mā lai la tul qadr

Arabic: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ ەۙ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ اَلْفِ شَهْرٍۗ
Transliteration: lailatul-qadri khairum min alfi syahr
Transcript: lai la tul qad ri khai rum min al fi syahr

Arabic: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلٰۤىِٕكَةُ وَالرُّوْحُ فِيْهَا بِاِذْنِ رَبِّهِمْۚ مِنْ كُلِّ اَمْرٍۛ
Transliteration: tanazzalul-malā`ikatu war-rụḥu fīhā bi`iżni rabbihim, ming kulli amr
Transcript: ta naz za lul ma lā `i ka tu war rụ ḥu fī hā bi `iż ni rab bi him , ming kul li amr

Arabic: سَلٰمٌ ۛهِيَ حَتّٰى مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ ࣖ
Transliteration: salāmun hiya ḥattā maṭla'il-fajr
Transcript: sa lā mun hi ya ḥat tā maṭ la 'il fajr

Arabic: لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ وَالْمُشْرِكِيْنَ
Transliteration: lam yakunillażīna kafarụ min ahlil-kitābi wal-musyrikī
Transcript: lam ya ku nil la żī na ka fa rụ min ah lil ki tā bi wal musy ri kī

Arabic: مُنْفَكِّيْنَ حَتّٰى تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُۙ
Transliteration: a munfakkīna ḥattā ta`tiyahumul-bayyina
Transcript: na mun fak kī na ḥat tā ta` ti ya hu mul bay yi na

Arabic: رَسُوْلٌ مِّنَ اللّٰهِ يَتْلُوْا صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةًۙ
Transliteration: rasụlum minallāhi yatlụ ṣuḥufam muṭahharah
Transcript: l llā hi yat lụ ṣu ḥu fam mu ṭah ha rah

Arabic: فِيْهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ ۗ
Transliteration: fīhā kutubung qayyimah
Transcript: fī hā ku tu bung qay yi mah

Arabic: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِيْنَ اُوْتُوا الْكِتٰبَ اِلَّا مِنْۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَاۤءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ ۗ
Transliteration: wa mā tafarraqallażīna ụtul-kitāba illā mim ba'di mā jā`at-humul-bayyinah
Transcript: wa mā ta far ra qal la żī na ụ tul ki tā ba il lā mim ba' di mā jā `at hu mul bay yi nah

Arabic: وَمَآ اُمِرُوْٓا اِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللّٰهَ مُخْلِصِيْنَ لَهُ الدِّيْنَ ەۙ حُنَفَاۤءَ
Transliteration: wa mā umirū illā liya'budullāha mukhliṣīna lahud-dīna ḥunafā`a
Transcript: l llā ha mukh li ṣī na la hud dī na ḥu na fā `a wa yu qī muṣ ṣa lā ta wa yu` tu

Arabic: وَيُقِيْمُوا الصَّلٰوةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكٰوةَ وَذٰلِكَ دِيْنُ الْقَيِّمَةِۗ
Transliteration: wa yuqīmuṣ-ṣalāta wa yu`tuz-zakāta wa żālika dīnul-qayyima
Transcript: a wa yu qī muṣ ṣa lā ta wa yu` tuz za kā ta wa żā li ka dī nul qay yi ma

Arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ كَفَرُوْا مِنْ اَهْلِ الْكِتٰبِ وَالْمُشْرِكِيْنَ فِيْ
Transliteration: nallażīna kafarụ min ahlil-kitābi wal-musyrikīna f
Transcript: n nal la żī na ka fa rụ min ah lil ki tā bi wal musy ri kī na f

Arabic: نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَاۗ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِۗ
Transliteration: nāri jahannama khālidīna fīhā, ulā`ika hum syarrul-bariyya
Transcript: ī nā ri ja han na ma khā li dī na fī hā , u lā `i ka hum syar rul ba riy ya

Arabic: اِنَّ الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ اُولٰۤىِٕكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِۗ
Transliteration: innallażīna āmanụ wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti ulā`ika hum khairul-bariyyah
Transcript: in nal la żī na ā ma nụ wa 'a mi luṣ ṣā li ḥā ti u lā `i ka hum khai rul ba riy yah

Arabic: جَزَاۤؤُهُمْ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنّٰتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِيْ مِنْ تَحْتِهَا
Transliteration: jazā`uhum 'inda rabbihim jannātu 'adnin tajrī min taḥtihal
Transcript: ja zā `u hum 'in da rab bi him jan nā tu 'ad nin taj rī min taḥ ti hal

Arabic: الْاَنْهٰرُ خٰلِدِيْنَ فِيْهَآ اَبَدًا ۗرَضِيَ اللّٰهُ عَنْهُمْ
Transliteration: l-an-hāru khālidīna fīhā abadā, raḍiyallāhu 'an-h
Transcript: al an hā ru khā li dī na fī hā a ba dā , ra ḍi yall llā hu 'a

Arabic: وَرَضُوْا عَنْهُ ۗ ذٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهٗ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa raḍụ 'an-h, żālika liman khasyiya rabba
Transcript: m wa ra ḍụ 'an h , żā li ka li man kha syi ya rab ba

Arabic: اِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْاَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَاۙ
Transliteration: iżā zulzilatil-arḍu zilzālahā
Transcript: i żā zul zi la til ar ḍu zil zā la hā

Arabic: وَاَخْرَجَتِ الْاَرْضُ اَثْقَالَهَاۙ
Transliteration: wa akhrajatil-arḍu aṡqālahā
Transcript: wa akh ra ja til ar ḍu aṡ qā la hā

Arabic: وَقَالَ الْاِنْسَانُ مَا لَهَاۚ
Transliteration: wa qālal-insānu mā lahā
Transcript: wa qā lal in sā nu mā la hā

Arabic: يَوْمَىِٕذٍ تُحَدِّثُ اَخْبَارَهَاۙ
Transliteration: yauma`iżin tuḥaddiṡu akhbārahā
Transcript: yau ma `i żin tu ḥad di ṡu akh bā ra hā

Arabic: بِاَنَّ رَبَّكَ اَوْحٰى لَهَاۗ
Transliteration: bi`anna rabbaka auḥā lahā
Transcript: bi `an na rab ba ka au ḥā la hā

Arabic: يَوْمَىِٕذٍ يَّصْدُرُ النَّاسُ اَشْتَاتًا ەۙ لِّيُرَوْا اَعْمَالَهُمْۗ
Transliteration: yauma`iżiy yaṣdurun-nāsu asytātal liyurau a'mālahum
Transcript: yau ma `i żiy yaṣ du run nā su asy tā tal li yu rau a' mā la hum

Arabic: فَمَنْ يَّعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَّرَهٗۚ
Transliteration: fa may ya'mal miṡqāla żarratin khairay yarah
Transcript: fa may ya' mal miṡ qā la żar ra tin khai ray ya rah

Arabic: وَمَنْ يَّعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَّرَهٗ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa may ya'mal miṡqāla żarratin syarray yarah
Transcript: wa may ya' mal miṡ qā la żar ra tin syar ray ya rah

Arabic: وَالْعٰدِيٰتِ ضَبْحًاۙ
Transliteration: wal-'ādiyāti ḍab-ḥā
Transcript: wal 'ā di yā ti ḍab ḥā

Arabic: فَالْمُوْرِيٰتِ قَدْحًاۙ
Transliteration: fal-mụriyāti qad-ḥā
Transcript: fal mụ ri yā ti qad ḥā

Arabic: فَالْمُغِيْرٰتِ صُبْحًاۙ
Transliteration: fal-mugīrāti ṣub-ḥā
Transcript: fal mu gī rā ti ṣub ḥā

Arabic: فَاَثَرْنَ بِهٖ نَقْعًاۙ
Transliteration: fa aṡarna bihī naq'ā
Transcript: fa a ṡar na bi hī naq 'ā

Arabic: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهٖ جَمْعًاۙ
Transliteration: fa wasaṭna bihī jam'ā
Transcript: fa wa saṭ na bi hī jam 'ā

Arabic: اِنَّ الْاِنْسَانَ لِرَبِّهٖ لَكَنُوْدٌ ۚ
Transliteration: innal-insāna lirabbihī lakanụd
Transcript: in nal in sā na li rab bi hī la ka nụd

Arabic: وَاِنَّهٗ عَلٰى ذٰلِكَ لَشَهِيْدٌۚ
Transliteration: wa innahụ 'alā żālika lasyahīd
Transcript: wa in na hụ 'a lā żā li ka la sya hīd

Arabic: وَاِنَّهٗ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيْدٌ ۗ
Transliteration: wa innahụ liḥubbil-khairi lasyadīd
Transcript: wa in na hụ li ḥub bil khai ri la sya dīd

Arabic: ۞ اَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ اِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى الْقُبُوْرِۙ
Transliteration: a fa lā ya'lamu iżā bu'ṡira mā fil-qubụr
Transcript: a fa lā ya' la mu i żā bu' ṡi ra mā fil qu bụr

Arabic: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِى الصُّدُوْرِۙ
Transliteration: wa huṣṣila mā fiṣ-ṣudụr
Transcript: wa huṣ ṣi la mā fiṣ ṣu dụr

Arabic: اِنَّ رَبَّهُمْ بِهِمْ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ لَّخَبِيْرٌ ࣖ
Transliteration: inna rabbahum bihim yauma`iżil lakhabīr
Transcript: in na rab ba hum bi him yau ma `i żil la kha bīr

Arabic: اَلْقَارِعَةُۙ
Transliteration: al-qāri'ah
Transcript: al qā ri 'ah

Arabic: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ ۚ
Transliteration: mal-qāri'ah
Transcript: mal qā ri 'ah

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ ۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mal-qāri'ah
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mal qā ri 'ah

Arabic: يَوْمَ يَكُوْنُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوْثِۙ
Transliteration: yauma yakụnun-nāsu kal-farāsyil-mabṡụṡ
Transcript: yau ma ya kụ nun nā su kal fa rā syil mab ṡụṡ

Arabic: وَتَكُوْنُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنْفُوْشِۗ
Transliteration: wa takụnul-jibālu kal-'ihnil-manfụsy
Transcript: wa ta kụ nul ji bā lu kal 'ih nil man fụsy

Arabic: فَاَمَّا مَنْ ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهٗۙ
Transliteration: fa ammā man ṡaqulat mawāzīnuh
Transcript: fa am mā man ṡa qu lat ma wā zī nuh

Arabic: فَهُوَ فِيْ عِيْشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍۗ
Transliteration: fa huwa fī 'īsyatir rāḍiyah
Transcript: fa hu wa fī 'ī sya tir rā ḍi yah

Arabic: وَاَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِيْنُهٗۙ
Transliteration: wa ammā man khaffat mawāzīnuh
Transcript: wa am mā man khaf fat ma wā zī nuh

Arabic: فَاُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ ۗ
Transliteration: fa ummuhụ hāwiyah
Transcript: fa um mu hụ hā wi yah

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا هِيَهْۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mā hiyah
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mā hi yah

Arabic: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ ࣖ
Transliteration: nārun ḥāmiyah
Transcript: nā run ḥā mi yah

Arabic: اَلْهٰىكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُۙ
Transliteration: al-hākumut-takāṡur
Transcript: al hā ku mut ta kā ṡur

Arabic: حَتّٰى زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَۗ
Transliteration: ḥattā zurtumul-maqābir
Transcript: ḥat tā zur tu mul ma qā bir

Arabic: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: kallā saufa ta'lamụn
Transcript: kal lā sau fa ta' la mụn

Arabic: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُوْنَ
Transliteration: ṡumma kallā saufa ta'lamụn
Transcript: ṡum ma kal lā sau fa ta' la mụn

Arabic: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُوْنَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِيْنِۗ
Transliteration: kallā lau ta'lamụna 'ilmal-yaqīn
Transcript: kal lā lau ta' la mụ na 'il mal ya qīn

Arabic: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيْمَۙ
Transliteration: latarawunnal-jaḥīm
Transcript: la ta ra wun nal ja ḥīm

Arabic: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِيْنِۙ
Transliteration: ṡumma latarawunnahā 'ainal-yaqīn
Transcript: ṡum ma la ta ra wun na hā 'ai nal ya qīn

Arabic: ثُمَّ لَتُسْـَٔلُنَّ يَوْمَىِٕذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيْمِ ࣖ
Transliteration: ṡumma latus`alunna yauma`iżin 'anin-na'īm
Transcript: ṡum ma la tus `a lun na yau ma `i żin 'a nin na 'īm

Arabic: وَالْعَصْرِۙ
Transliteration: wal-'aṣr
Transcript: wal 'aṣr

Arabic: اِنَّ الْاِنْسَانَ لَفِيْ خُسْرٍۙ
Transliteration: innal-insāna lafī khusr
Transcript: in nal in sā na la fī khusr

Arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ ەۙ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ ࣖ
Transliteration: illallażīna āmanụ wa 'amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti wa tawāṣau bil-ḥaqqi wa tawāṣau biṣ-ṣabr
Transcript: il lal la żī na ā ma nụ wa 'a mi luṣ ṣā li ḥā ti wa ta wā ṣau bil ḥaq qi wa ta wā ṣau biṣ ṣabr

Arabic: وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍۙ
Transliteration: wailul likulli humazatil lumazah
Transcript: wai lul li kul li hu ma za til lu ma zah

Arabic: ۨالَّذِيْ جَمَعَ مَالًا وَّعَدَّدَهٗۙ
Transliteration: allażī jama'a mālaw wa 'addadah
Transcript: al la żī ja ma 'a mā law wa 'ad da dah

Arabic: يَحْسَبُ اَنَّ مَالَهٗٓ اَخْلَدَهٗۚ
Transliteration: yaḥsabu anna mālahū akhladah
Transcript: yaḥ sa bu an na mā la hū akh la dah

Arabic: كَلَّا لَيُنْۢبَذَنَّ فِى الْحُطَمَةِۖ
Transliteration: kallā layumbażanna fil-ḥuṭamah
Transcript: kal lā la yum ba żan na fil ḥu ṭa mah

Arabic: وَمَآ اَدْرٰىكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ ۗ
Transliteration: wa mā adrāka mal-ḥuṭamah
Transcript: wa mā ad rā ka mal ḥu ṭa mah

Arabic: نَارُ اللّٰهِ الْمُوْقَدَةُۙ
Transliteration: nārullāhil-mụqadah
Transcript: l llā hil mụ qa dah

Arabic: الَّتِيْ تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْاَفْـِٕدَةِۗ
Transliteration: allatī taṭṭali'u 'alal-af`idah
Transcript: al la tī taṭ ṭa li 'u 'a lal af `i dah

Arabic: اِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِمْ مُّؤْصَدَةٌۙ
Transliteration: innahā 'alaihim mu`ṣadah
Transcript: in na hā 'a lai him mu` ṣa dah

Arabic: فِيْ عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: fī 'amadim mumaddadah
Transcript: fī 'a ma dim mu mad da dah

Arabic: اَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِاَصْحٰبِ الْفِيْلِۗ
Transliteration: a lam tara kaifa fa'ala rabbuka bi`aṣ-ḥābil-fīl
Transcript: a lam ta ra kai fa fa 'a la rab bu ka bi `aṣ ḥā bil fīl

Arabic: اَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِيْ تَضْلِيْلٍۙ
Transliteration: a lam yaj'al kaidahum fī taḍlīl
Transcript: a lam yaj 'al kai da hum fī taḍ līl

Arabic: وَّاَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا اَبَابِيْلَۙ
Transliteration: wa arsala 'alaihim ṭairan abābīl
Transcript: wa ar sa la 'a lai him ṭai ran a bā bīl

Arabic: تَرْمِيْهِمْ بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّنْ سِجِّيْلٍۙ
Transliteration: tarmīhim biḥijāratim min sijjīl
Transcript: tar mī him bi ḥi jā ra tim min sij jīl

Arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُوْلٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: fa ja'alahum ka'aṣfim ma`kụl
Transcript: fa ja 'a la hum ka 'aṣ fim ma` kụl

Arabic: لِاِيْلٰفِ قُرَيْشٍۙ
Transliteration: li`īlāfi quraīsy
Transcript: li `ī lā fi qu raīsy

Arabic: اٖلٰفِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاۤءِ وَالصَّيْفِۚ
Transliteration: īlāfihim riḥlatasy-syitā`i waṣ-ṣaīf
Transcript: ī lā fi him riḥ la tasy syi tā `i waṣ ṣaīf

Arabic: فَلْيَعْبُدُوْا رَبَّ هٰذَا الْبَيْتِۙ
Transliteration: falya'budụ rabba hāżal-baīt
Transcript: fal ya' bu dụ rab ba hā żal baīt

Arabic: الَّذِيْٓ اَطْعَمَهُمْ مِّنْ جُوْعٍ ەۙ وَّاٰمَنَهُمْ مِّنْ خَوْفٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: allażī aṭ'amahum min jụ'iw wa āmanahum min khaụf
Transcript: al la żī aṭ 'a ma hum min jụ 'iw wa ā ma na hum min khaụf

Arabic: اَرَءَيْتَ الَّذِيْ يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّيْنِۗ
Transliteration: a ra`aitallażī yukażżibu bid-dīn
Transcript: a ra `ai tal la żī yu każ żi bu bid dīn

Arabic: فَذٰلِكَ الَّذِيْ يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيْمَۙ
Transliteration: fa żālikallażī yadu''ul-yatīm
Transcript: fa żā li kal la żī ya du' 'ul ya tīm

Arabic: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلٰى طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِيْنِۗ
Transliteration: wa lā yaḥuḍḍu 'alā ṭa'āmil-miskīn
Transcript: wa lā ya ḥuḍ ḍu 'a lā ṭa 'ā mil mis kīn

Arabic: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّيْنَۙ
Transliteration: fa wailul lil-muṣallīn
Transcript: fa wai lul lil mu ṣal līn

Arabic: الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ عَنْ صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: allażīna hum 'an ṣalātihim sāhụn
Transcript: al la żī na hum 'an ṣa lā ti him sā hụn

Arabic: الَّذِيْنَ هُمْ يُرَاۤءُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: allażīna hum yurā`ụn
Transcript: al la żī na hum yu rā `ụn

Arabic: وَيَمْنَعُوْنَ الْمَاعُوْنَ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa yamna'ụnal-mā'ụn
Transcript: wa yam na 'ụ nal mā 'ụn

Arabic: اِنَّآ اَعْطَيْنٰكَ الْكَوْثَرَۗ
Transliteration: innā a'ṭainākal-kauṡar
Transcript: in nā a' ṭai nā kal kau ṡar

Arabic: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْۗ
Transliteration: fa ṣalli lirabbika wan-ḥar
Transcript: fa ṣal li li rab bi ka wan ḥar

Arabic: اِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْاَبْتَرُ ࣖ
Transliteration: inna syāni`aka huwal-abtar
Transcript: in na syā ni `a ka hu wal ab tar

Arabic: قُلْ يٰٓاَيُّهَا الْكٰفِرُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: qul yā ayyuhal-kāfirụn
Transcript: qul yā ay yu hal kā fi rụn

Arabic: لَآ اَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُوْنَۙ
Transliteration: lā a'budu mā ta'budụn
Transcript: lā a' bu du mā ta' bu dụn

Arabic: وَلَآ اَنْتُمْ عٰبِدُوْنَ مَآ اَعْبُدُۚ
Transliteration: wa lā antum 'ābidụna mā a'bud
Transcript: wa lā an tum 'ā bi dụ na mā a' bud

Arabic: وَلَآ اَنَا۠ عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدْتُّمْۙ
Transliteration: wa lā ana 'ābidum mā 'abattum
Transcript: wa lā a na 'ā bi dum mā 'a bat tum

Arabic: وَلَآ اَنْتُمْ عٰبِدُوْنَ مَآ اَعْبُدُۗ
Transliteration: wa lā antum 'ābidụna mā a'bud
Transcript: wa lā an tum 'ā bi dụ na mā a' bud

Arabic: لَكُمْ دِيْنُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِيْنِ ࣖ
Transliteration: lakum dīnukum wa liya dīn
Transcript: la kum dī nu kum wa li ya dīn

Arabic: اِذَا جَاۤءَ نَصْرُ اللّٰهِ وَالْفَتْحُۙ
Transliteration: iżā jā`a naṣrullāhi wal-fat-ḥ
Transcript: i żā jā `a naṣ rull llā hi wal fa

Arabic: وَرَاَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُوْنَ فِيْ دِيْنِ اللّٰهِ اَفْوَاجًاۙ
Transliteration: wa ra`aitan-nāsa yadkhulụna fī dīnillāhi afwājā
Transcript: wa ra `ai tan nā sa yad khu lụ na fī dī nil lā hi af wā jā

Arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُۗ اِنَّهٗ كَانَ تَوَّابًا ࣖ
Transliteration: fa sabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastagfir-h, innahụ kāna tawwābā
Transcript: fa sab biḥ bi ḥam di rab bi ka was tag fir h , in na hụ kā na taw wā bā

Arabic: تَبَّتْ يَدَآ اَبِيْ لَهَبٍ وَّتَبَّۗ
Transliteration: tabbat yadā abī lahabiw wa tabb
Transcript: tab bat ya dā a bī la ha biw wa tabb

Arabic: مَآ اَغْنٰى عَنْهُ مَالُهٗ وَمَا كَسَبَۗ
Transliteration: mā agnā 'an-hu māluhụ wa mā kasab
Transcript: mā ag nā 'an hu mā lu hụ wa mā ka sab

Arabic: سَيَصْلٰى نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍۙ
Transliteration: sayaṣlā nāran żāta lahab
Transcript: sa yaṣ lā nā ran żā ta la hab

Arabic: وَّامْرَاَتُهٗ ۗحَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِۚ
Transliteration: wamra`atuh, ḥammālatal-ḥaṭab
Transcript: wam ra `a tuh , ḥam mā la tal ḥa ṭab

Arabic: فِيْ جِيْدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّنْ مَّسَدٍ ࣖ
Transliteration: fī jīdihā ḥablum mim masad
Transcript: fī jī di hā ḥab lum mim ma sad

Arabic: قُلْ هُوَ اللّٰهُ اَحَدٌۚ
Transliteration: qul huwallāhu aḥad
Transcript: qul hu wall llā hu a ḥ

Arabic: اَللّٰهُ الصَّمَدُۚ
Transliteration: allāhuṣ-ṣamad
Transcript: l llā huṣ ṣa mad

Arabic: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُوْلَدْۙ
Transliteration: lam yalid wa lam yụlad
Transcript: lam ya lid wa lam yụ lad

Arabic: وَلَمْ يَكُنْ لَّهٗ كُفُوًا اَحَدٌ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa lam yakul lahụ kufuwan aḥad
Transcript: wa lam ya kul la hụ ku fu wan a ḥad

Arabic: قُلْ اَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِۙ
Transliteration: qul a'ụżu birabbil-falaq
Transcript: qul a 'ụ żu bi rab bil fa laq

Arabic: مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَۙ
Transliteration: min syarri mā khalaq
Transcript: min syar ri mā kha laq

Arabic: وَمِنْ شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ اِذَا وَقَبَۙ
Transliteration: wa min syarri gāsiqin iżā waqab
Transcript: wa min syar ri gā si qin i żā wa qab

Arabic: وَمِنْ شَرِّ النَّفّٰثٰتِ فِى الْعُقَدِۙ
Transliteration: wa min syarrin-naffāṡāti fil-'uqad
Transcript: wa min syar rin naf fā ṡā ti fil 'u qad

Arabic: وَمِنْ شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ اِذَا حَسَدَ ࣖ
Transliteration: wa min syarri ḥāsidin iżā ḥasad
Transcript: wa min syar ri ḥā si din i żā ḥa sad

Arabic: قُلْ اَعُوْذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِۙ
Transliteration: qul a'ụżu birabbin-nās
Transcript: qul a 'ụ żu bi rab bin nās

Arabic: مَلِكِ النَّاسِۙ
Transliteration: malikin-nās
Transcript: ma li kin nās

Arabic: اِلٰهِ النَّاسِۙ
Transliteration: ilāhin-nās
Transcript: i lā hin nās

Arabic: مِنْ شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ ەۙ الْخَنَّاسِۖ
Transliteration: min syarril-waswāsil-khannās
Transcript: min syar ril was wā sil khan nās

Arabic: الَّذِيْ يُوَسْوِسُ فِيْ صُدُوْرِ النَّاسِۙ
Transliteration: allażī yuwaswisu fī ṣudụrin-nās
Transcript: al la żī yu was wi su fī ṣu dụ rin nās

Arabic: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ ࣖ
Transliteration: minal-jinnati wan-nās
Transcript: mi nal jin na ti wan nās
